title: The Adventures of Judy Campbell, the Guiding Light

story.text: Judy Campbell, with her passion for training and guiding, discovers an ability to see into the near future during her morning jog. She sees an image of a child lost in the nearby park.
Judy goes to the park and uses her intuition to find and rescue the child before he gets too scared. Grateful parents thank Judy, unaware of her new powers.
Judy spends the day honing her skill, realizing it strengthens with her intent to help others. She decides to start a neighborhood watch program.
During a meeting with local neighbors, Judy shares safety tips and subtly guides the group to prepare for minor emergencies, using her insights.
A minor earthquake shakes the community. Thanks to Judy's preparatory guidance, all her neighbors are safe, and damages are minimal.
A local newspaper catches wind of Judyâ€™s efforts and publishes a story about her, calling her 'The Guiding Light' of their community.
Judy reflects on her week, feeling fulfilled. She commits to using her powers to guide her community toward safety and preparedness.

ending: In a world full of uncertainties, one guiding light can make all the difference.
moral: Empowering and preparing others is a true superhero's mission.
